teams.name: Naomi and Ben's Wedding
teams.loan_because: We'd love for this moment in our lives to  help create a little lasting good in the world.
teams.description:
Please follow these steps to contribute: 

1) Go to http://www.kiva.org/gifts/kiva-cards#/email
2) Click the link that says "send via Kiva Lender ID"
3) Enter "ben2283" as the Lender ID, and then fill out the rest of the form.
